source: 好的爱情使你通过一个人看到整个世界，坏的爱情使你为了一个人舍弃整个世界。

source: 所谓成功，就是爱你自己，喜欢自己做的事，以及喜欢自己做事的方式
standard: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
answer: Success is how you love yourself, what you do, how you like to do it.

source: 没人能够改变另一个人，但却能成为别人改变的一个原因。
standard: No one can change a person,but someone can be a reason for that person to change.
answer: No one can change another, but it can be a reason for others to change.

source: 早上醒来想到的第一个人和晚上睡觉前想到的最后一个人要么是你幸福的缘由，要么是你痛苦的根源。
standard: It makes sense.The first person that you think of in the morning and the last person you think of at night is either the cause of your happiness or the cause of your pain.
answer: The first person to wake up in the morning and the last person to think before sleeping at night is either the cause of your happiness or the cause of your suffering.

source: 没有人可以回到过去重新开始，但谁都可以从今日开始，书写一个全然不同的结局。
standard: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
answer: No one can go back to the past and start over, but anyone can start today and write a completely different ending.

source: 很多人一开始为了梦想而忙，后来忙的忘了梦想。
standard: Many people start a career with a dream, then get busy forgetting it.
answer: Many people were busy with their dreams at first, and then they were busy forgetting them.

source: 除了你自己没有人知道你想要什么。
standard: Except for you.Nobody knows what you want except for you.
answer: Nobody but yourself knows what you want.

source: 我多想在你身边醒来。
standard: I want to wake up where you are.
answer: I want to wake up next to you.

source: 我觉得自己很蠢，而且这种蠢带有传染性
standard: I feel stupid and contagious
answer: I think I'm stupid, and it's contagious.

source: 摆在我们面前的困难并不是要阻挡我们，而是唤起我们的勇气和力量
standard: Hard things are put in our way , not to stop us , but to call out our courage and strength.
answer: The difficulty before us is not to stop us, but to summon our courage and strength.

source: 想发现新大陆，就得做好很长时间看不到岸边的准备。
standard: In order to discover new lands, one must be willing to lose sight of the shore for a very long time.
answer: In order to discover the new continent, we must be prepared to lose sight of the shore for a long time.

source: 当有人离开你的生活时，随他们去吧。这只是给更好的人留足了进入你生活的空间
standard: When someone walk out your life, let them. They are just making more room for someone else better to walk in.
answer: When people leave your life, let them go. It's just a space for better people to get into your life.

source: 当我站在人生最高处的时候，我觉得那是我觉得最美丽的时刻
standard: The high challengeI have never in my life felt more beautiful than when I have stood my tallest.
answer: When I'm at the top of my life, I think it's the most beautiful moment I've ever felt.

source: 生命的价值也许并不能用长度去衡量，而在于我们如何使用了这些时光，让自己回望来路无怨无悔。
standard: The value of life lies not in the length of days, but in the use we make of them.
answer: The value of life may not be measured by the length of time, but by how we use these times to bring us back to life without regret.

source: 世界太大，生命这样短，要把它过得尽量像自己想要的那个样子。
standard: The world is so big, and life is so short. We need to do as much as possible to live our lives the way we want to.
answer: The world is too big, life is so short, to live as much as you want.

source: 我们是一家人，手牵手一同步入黑暗，虽然我们可能信仰不同，但我相信这几句话能代表所有信仰的精神。
standard: we are one family,stepping into the darkness together.We are a nation of many religions,but I believe these words reflect the spirit of all our faiths.
answer: We are a family, holding hands in the dark, and while we may believe in different faiths, I believe that these words represent the spirit of all faiths.

source: 在这世上珍贵的东西总是罕有，所以这世上只有一个你。
standard: things are very few in this world.That is the reason there is just one you.
answer: There's always something precious in this world, so there's only one you.

source: 其实好莱坞的电影套路都是一样的。
standard: In fact the set patterns of Hollywood movies are all the same.
answer: Hollywood is actually the same movie set.

source: 无论生活之路会遇到多少障碍，我都会竭尽所能地跑完这一程。

source: 如果你想过得快乐，那就把生活和目标结合在一起，而不是来自他人或物质。
standard: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal. Not to people or things.
answer: If you want to be happy, then put life and goals together, not from others or from matter.

source: 这是我训练前拍得照片，我相信训练完就不会有这样的笑容了。
standard: That picture was taken before training and I can only say that the smiles were gone by the time training was over.
answer: This is a photo taken before my training, and I'm sure there won't be such a smile after my training.

source: 要么没有，要么全部。要么现在，要么永不

source: 从来没有人可以取代你。

source: 伤心没有用，让自己好好地生活才最重要。爱情虽美，却不是生活的全部。

answer: Sadness doesn't work. It's important to live a good life. Love, while beautiful, is not the whole of life.

source: 义人得脱离患难，有恶人来代替他。

source: 新政府的组成
standard: formation of a new government

source: 爱情是灯，友情是影子，当灯灭了，你会发现你的周围都是影子。朋友，是在最后可以给你力量的人。

source: 我们说我们爱花朵，但是我们要采。说爱树木，但是我们要砍，我想这就是为什么那么多人在听到别人说爱自己的时候充满了恐惧。
standard: We say we love flowers, yet we pluck them. We say we love trees, yet we cut them down. And people still wonder why some are afraid when told they are loved.
answer: We say we love flowers, but we're going to pick them. We're going to cut trees, and I think that's why so many people are filled with fear when they hear people say they love themselves.

answer: Love lies not in looking at one another, but in looking in the same direction.

source: 临在的天性就是接受、允许和包容。如果你有评判，你就无法处在当下。理由很简单，因为在临在里是没有评判的

standard: Dear,I lose my temper at you it is because you are getting closer to me.
answer: Honey, I'm mad at you because you're closer to me.

source: 我们想为这批货物投保全损险。
standard: We like to get a policy for total loss only for these goods.
answer: We want to insure the entire cargo.

source: 时间能医治一切创伤。
standard: Time heals all wounds.
answer: Time heals all wounds.

source: 人的善良或邪恶都存在于他自己的意志之中
standard: The good or ill of man lies within his own will.
answer: A man's good or evil is in his own will.

source: 忒修斯之船
standard: The ship of the Theseus.
answer: The ship of Trish.

source: 幽长黑暗的隧道尽头必有希望之光
standard: It is always light at the end of the tunnel.
answer: There must be a light of hope at the end of the long, dark tunnel.

source: 能发现自己的错误是智慧，能改正自己的错误是勇敢。
standard: Can find their own mistakes is wisdom, to correct its mistakes is brave
answer: It is wisdom to find its own mistakes, and courage to correct its own mistakes.
